object-detection.title: Vehicle Entry/Exit
object-detection.details: A Vehicle Entry/Exit system is a solution designed to monitor, record, and manage the movement of vehicles entering and exiting a specific area. It ensures security and efficiency in parking and restricted areas.

object-detection.title: People Counting
object-detection.description: Crowd analytics to measure the flow of people.
object-detection.details: A People Counting system accurately tracks the number of people entering, exiting, or occupying a space in real-time, aiding in resource management and safety compliance.

object-detection.title: Employee Access Control
object-detection.description: Detect and alert intrusions within premises.
object-detection.details: An Employee Access Control system manages and monitors employee access, ensuring only authorized individuals can enter sensitive areas.

security-surveillance.title: Facial Recognition
security-surveillance.details: Facial Recognition uses AI to verify identities based on facial features, providing seamless and secure access to premises.

security-surveillance.title: Intrusion Detection
security-surveillance.description: Detect and alert intrusions within premises.
security-surveillance.details: Intrusion Detection monitors and identifies unauthorized access or suspicious activities, sending instant alerts to ensure safety.

security-surveillance.title: Real-time Video Surveillance
security-surveillance.details: Real-time Video Surveillance analyzes video feeds to detect incidents, enhancing security and operational efficiency.

Worker monitoring and attendance.title: Emergency Response
Worker monitoring and attendance.details: Emergency Response systems provide real-time tracking of employees during emergencies, ensuring swift action and accountability.

Worker monitoring and attendance.title: Automated Attendance Tracking
Worker monitoring and attendance.description: Ensure workers comply with safety protocols.
Worker monitoring and attendance.details: Attendance Tracking automates the process of recording attendance, minimizing manual errors and improving workforce management.

vehicle-monitoring.description: Automate vehicle entry using license plate recognition.
vehicle-monitoring.details: License Plate Recognition uses OCR technology to detect and read license plates, ensuring secure and efficient vehicle entry.
